document.full_text: libyan rebels said thursday they had control of a post on the tunisian border, possibly opening a new channel for opposition forces in moammar gadhafi's bastion in western libya.
document.title: libya rebels claim control of tunisian border post
lines_and_colors: libyan rebels said thursday they had control of a post on the tunisian border, possibly opening a new channel for opposition forces in moammar gadhafi's bastion in western libya.
